channel.title: TrisidiaX Commands! Help! Thanks!
channel.description:
[b]Hey guys been working on TrisidiaX for a couple of weeks now and most of the commands have not been added yet but i have no idea how to add commands! i wanted to add ::pure ::commands list ::rules for normal players & staff members ::staffzone
;D :palm: :confused: :o :P :rolleyes: :cool: :eek: :(
Download my TrisidiaX Commands.java
https://dl.dropboxusercontent.com/u/71877387/Commands.java
Thanks Josh[/b]

item.title: TrisidiaX Commands! Help! Thanks!
item.dc:creator: @haviland4 haviland4
item.description:
@haviland4 wrote:

[quote=“Loveandpower, post:3, topic:529395”]*Note: not my commands, I did edit the text in the rules though if anybody wants a good read

Pure:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("pure"){ for (int i = 0; i > 1 && i < 7; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.platerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); c.pure = 1; } }

Commands

[code=java]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“namehere”)) {
c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
c.flushOutStream();
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Server - Commands", 8144);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Player Commands", 8145);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8147);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8148);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Moderator Commands", 8150);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8151);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8152);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8153);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@ Administrator Commands", 8154);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8155);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8156);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8157);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@ Owner Commands", 8158);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8159);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8160);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8161);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8162);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8163);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8164);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8165);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8166);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8167);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8168);
c.sendMessage("");

		}[/code]

Rules:

[code=java] (playerCommand.startsWith(“rules”)) {

			c.sendMessage("Welcome to *Server Name*");
			c.sendMessage("1. L&P is God.");
			c.sendMessage("2. No more than two babies!");
			c.sendMessage("3. Elves and Dwarves = a no no for babymaking.");
			c.sendMessage("4. I just farted.");
			c.sendMessage("5. Are you still reading this? rofl....");
			c.sendMessage("6. Babymaking is THE LAW.");
			c.sendMessage("7. No slash!");
			c.sendMessage("8. Remember to share the love :).");
			c.sendMessage("9. Still reading...jeez....");
			c.sendMessage("10. -add random stuff, here cba.");
			c.sendMessage("11. my balls are on fire LOL.");
			c.sendMessage("12. l2notabuseyochild!");
			c.sendMessage("13. No Babymaking Farming.");
			c.sendMessage("14. No hating on the dwarf babies just cause they are short.");
			c.sendMessage("16. Still reading this? Seriously dude, seek help! NOW!");

}[/code][/quote]

cheers dude
contact me skype:haviland41
i have a couple of problems with the cachedownloading.

Read full topic

item.title: TrisidiaX Commands! Help! Thanks!
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

*Note: not my commands, I did edit the text in the rules though if anybody wants a good read

Pure:

if (playerCommand.startsWith("pure"){ for (int i = 0; i > 1 && i < 7; i++) { c.playerLevel[i] = 99; c.platerXP[i] = c.getPA().getXPForLevel(100); c.getPA().refreshSkill(i); c.getPA().requestUpdates(); c.pure = 1; } }

Commands

[code=java]if (playerCommand.equalsIgnoreCase(“namehere”)) {
c.getPA().showInterface(8134);
c.flushOutStream();
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@gre@Server - Commands", 8144);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@whi@Player Commands", 8145);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8147);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8148);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8149);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@red@Moderator Commands", 8150);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8151);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8152);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8153);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@blu@ Administrator Commands", 8154);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8155);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8156);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8157);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("@yel@ Owner Commands", 8158);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8159);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8160);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8161);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8162);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8163);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8164);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8165);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8166);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8167);
c.getPA().sendFrame126("", 8168);
c.sendMessage("");

		}[/code]

Rules:

[code=java] (playerCommand.startsWith(“rules”)) {

			c.sendMessage("Welcome to *Server Name*");
			c.sendMessage("1. L&P is God.");
			c.sendMessage("2. No more than two babies!");
			c.sendMessage("3. Elves and Dwarves = a no no for babymaking.");
			c.sendMessage("4. I just farted.");
			c.sendMessage("5. Are you still reading this? rofl....");
			c.sendMessage("6. Babymaking is THE LAW.");
			c.sendMessage("7. No slash!");
			c.sendMessage("8. Remember to share the love :).");
			c.sendMessage("9. Still reading...jeez....");
			c.sendMessage("10. -add random stuff, here cba.");
			c.sendMessage("11. my balls are on fire LOL.");
			c.sendMessage("12. l2notabuseyochild!");
			c.sendMessage("13. No Babymaking Farming.");
			c.sendMessage("14. No hating on the dwarf babies just cause they are short.");
			c.sendMessage("16. Still reading this? Seriously dude, seek help! NOW!");

}[/code]
